duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and maintain rapport with key store individuals while providing outstanding customer service.
Maximize sales, conduct effective planning & order-writing.
Support and complete activities such as merchandising displays and partnering with nationally recognized customers.
Carry out in-store visits to ensure leading brands are well represented, stocked, and maintained.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Work in conjunction with the Merchandisers to ensure inventory is fully stocked, rotated, and presentable at all times.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. College degree preferred.
